pageContent:
Work Experience
Senior Software Engineer - Informatica
April 2021 - Present
•Enhanced  customer  security  for  Informatica  CDI-E  using AWS  PrivateLink.  Challenging  tasks  included  configuring 
Network  Load  Balancers,  coordinating  with  global  teams,  conducting  scrums,  validating  features,  and  synchronizing 
tasks for a secure customer environment with a timely delivery. 
•Reduced the latency by 97% for data integration executions by leading a team of engineers. Implemented a strategic 
caching layer, optimizing submission time from 12000 s to 318 s, addressing workflow delays. 
•Enhanced Informatica mapping runtimes by 15%, incorporating meticulous design and runtime validations. This 
resulted in increased efficiency, prevented cloud resource wastage, and provided crucial insights for logic alignment. 
[1]
 
•Achieved real-time visibility into data integration logs by implementing a cloud-native solution with Logstash, and

[1]
 
•Achieved real-time visibility into data integration logs by implementing a cloud-native solution with Logstash, and 
Elasticsearch resulting in centralized logging, improved user experience, and scalability. 
•Owned, maintained, and contributed to an internal backbone service called Mapping Translation Service (MTS)  
•Reduced estimated quarterly issues from 30 to 2, achieving an outstanding 93% enhancement in MTS's resiliency 
through strategic initiatives and proactive measures. 
•A key contributor to an 80% improvement in the pipeline design, empowering customers with reliable data integration.  
•Instituted ongoing security upgrades, ensuring MTS’s security through best practices and third-party library vigilance. 
•Led the design and execution of a visual runtime plan for Advanced (CDI-E) mappings, computing Informatica's 
transformation task lineage. Resulting in a significant 50% increase in mapping execution insights. 
[1]

transformation task lineage. Resulting in a significant 50% increase in mapping execution insights. 
[1]
 
•Supported Snowflake ELT ecosystem pushdown project, resolving last-minute issues. Implemented effective solutions, 
ensuring the projects’ success, and contributing to overall project success. 
•Enabled 20% data integration logic reuse through implementation of optional transformations in Informatica CDI-E 
for flexible data flow. They adapt to field availability, prevent failure, and enhance pipeline robustness. 
•Led the seamless AWS IMDSv2 integration for Spark Kubernetes clusters on EC2 boot-up. Precision-scripted within 
AWS's 16KB limit, fulfilling a pivotal customer feature request. 
[1]
 
•Contributed  to  the  storage  scalar  project,  utilizing AWS  Go  SDK  to  ensure  precise  storage  scaling  compliance  with 
AWS IMDSv2. Achieved seamless storage provisioning for EC2 nodes during boot-up.

AWS IMDSv2. Achieved seamless storage provisioning for EC2 nodes during boot-up. 
•Implemented  Machine  Learning  transformation  for  streamlined  integration  with  cloud-deployed  models.  Empowered 
customers for seamless machine learning integration in data workflows. 
[1]
 
•Accomplished  nearly  25%  faster  feature  delivery  by  addressing  70+  vulnerabilities  across  microservices,  Spark 
codebase,  and  dependencies.  Implemented  knowledge  transfer,  streamlined  BlackDuck  approvals,  and  introduced 
efficient testing methodologies. 
•Participated  in  enterprise  customer  escalations  calls  to  determine  the  root  cause  and  deliver  acceptable  solutions. 
Gained technical proficiency using the Kibana console to discover logs. 
•Implemented  'Launchpad'  improving  developer  onboarding  with  a  user-friendly  platform,  unifying  code  base  setups, 
and simplifying local CDI-E product setup. Achieved an 85% increase in engineering productivity.

and simplifying local CDI-E product setup. Achieved an 85% increase in engineering productivity. 
•Led  a  machine  learning-driven  initiative  that  fine-tuned  Informatica  mappings  (Spark  applications).  This  project 
received an honorable mention and was subsequently productized as a full-fledged cloud microservice. 
[1]
 
•Elevated team competency through the delivery of 25+ hours of Product Knowledge Transfer (KT) sessions, ensuring 
in-depth understanding and proficiency across functional areas. 
•Enhanced product understanding through mentoring new team members and customer support teams. 
•Expanded global usability through Informatica CDI-E product internationalization. 
•Fueled team growth through effective intern and employee recruitment interviews.
Software Engineer - Informatica
Jul 2017 – March 2021
•Strengthened Informatica's DEI (aka Data Engineering Integration) with Spark's CSV functionality, enabling seamless 
integration with AWS and Azure Databricks. 
[1] [2]

Jul 2017 – March 2021
•Strengthened Informatica's DEI (aka Data Engineering Integration) with Spark's CSV functionality, enabling seamless 
integration with AWS and Azure Databricks. 
[1] [2]

breakthrough by enabling support for intricate Hive data types like arrays, maps, and structs. 
[1] [2]
 
•Enriched  Informatica  DEI’s  AWS  and  Azure  Databricks  integration  with  extended  Python  transformation  support, 
empowering users to execute custom Python code seamlessly for enhanced and flexible data transformation. 
[1] [2] [3]
 
•Achieved  operational  efficiency  by  seamlessly  integrating  Cloudera Altus  with  Informatica  DEI,  scripting Altus  CLI 
commands to enable on-demand deployment and shutdown of Hadoop clusters. 
[1]

commands to enable on-demand deployment and shutdown of Hadoop clusters. 
[1]
 
•Enhanced  compatibility  with  Hadoop  cluster  distributions  by  seamlessly  integrating  DEI  with  major  cloud  providers 
(Amazon, Hortonworks, Cloudera), optimizing data engineering workflows for improved performance.
Software Development Intern - Informatica
May 2016 - Aug 2016
•Conducted in-depth research and seamlessly integrated rank transformation functionality within Informatica Big Data 
Edition (aka Big Data Management), meeting strict project deadlines. 
[1]
